entry.title: New Family Member: Muji
entry.content:
Here’s our new family member, a six-month old cat Muji. Damn she’s so naughty!

->Plotting the ultimate demise of Green Line.<-

My girlfriend and I have adopted two cats back when we’re in Chengdu. This time we went to Animal Rescue League of Boston for adoption.

I may have an unusual appreciation for Every adoption made me pretty

Wish we’ll be happy staying together in the following decade.
